title: Player names
body: I am wondering, is there anything that can be done if a name i really want to use for an ign is taken by a lvl 1 who hasn't played in over a year when i made this account?

replies.body: We can't simply take the name away from someone, but you're still in luck! The [**Summoner Name Clean-Up FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914) mentions that level 1 accounts need 6 months of inactivity before the name becomes available.
